text: The Secretary of State of Arizona is an elected position in the U.S. state of Arizona. Since Arizona does not have a lieutenant governor, the Secretary stands first in the line of succession to the governorship. ==List of living former secretaries== Secretary of State Term Date of birth (and age) Richard D. Mahoney 1991–1995 Betsey Bayless 1997–2003 Jan Brewer 2003–2009 Ken Bennett 2009–2015 Michele Reagan 2015–2019 Katie Hobbs 2019–2023 ==References== *
title: Secretary of State of Arizona
